root.name: DeviousMUD
root.description: DeviousMUD is mostly unfinished multiplayer RPG game (MUD stands for Multi-User Dungeon) with isometric graphics. It was only playable for one week as a public beta. It was completely rewritten and renamed to RuneScape. The map of the world has been slightly changed - left and right side are flipped.Only few screenshots of this game remain, and while it still is on one of JaGEx computers, there is no way to play it.
